entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
